title: How do people have fun in League Nowadays?
body:
Is winning everything. I have been playing for 4 years now and I know the community has always been changing as time goes on but is winning really everything now. Rarely do you get a Normal (Draft or Blind) game that doesn't have at least 1 or 2 people in it that just get so angry if they or someone else isn't winning the game on their side, even Aram is filled with people who just get angry that their not going 15/0 and its All Random.

I know that the majority of people aren't like this (or maybe they are and im just blind as well as deaf) but where are those people now. Where are the people that can laugh off a serious mistake by a teammate, the people that were willing to go Lulu jungle even though they know that they will probably lose the game. I understand that having someone on your team throw the game for you is frustrating but its Normals, shouldn't the main goal be having fun not winning the game or are they one and the same?

I don't know, maybe im just crazy. Maybe I should just stick to playing with bots (but that isn't any fun anymore seeing how they don't provide any challenge). Maybe its just me now, maybe I don't know how to have fun with League anymore. Maybe this whole post was just a waste of time and if it is im sorry but I like League and I want to play but I guess I don't really know how to anymore.
